articles.title: Twitter takes Centre to court over some orders for takedown of content
articles.description: Last month, the IT Ministry had written to Twitter, asking it to comply with its orders by July 4 or lose its safe harbour protection under the intermediary rules.

articles.title: Coronavirus Highlights: India Records 13,086 New COVID-19 Cases In 24 Hours
articles.description: India today recorded 13,086 fresh coronavirus cases, taking the total number of COVID-19 cases to 4,35,31,650. India's death count rose to 5,25,242 with 19 new coronavirus deaths in the last 24 hours.
articles.content:

articles.title: SpiceJet flight makes landing at Karachi airport after indicator light malfunction
articles.description: "On July 5, 2022, SpiceJet B737 aircraft operating flight SG-11 (Delhi - Dubai) was diverted to Karachi due to an indicator light malfunctioning. The aircraft landed safely at Karachi and passengers were safely disembarked," SpiceJet said.
